javadoc: Contains miscellaneous defines used for options.
name: GhidraOptions
comment: Contains miscellaneous defines used for options.

fields.javadoc:
Character used to create a "hierarchy" for a property name; the delimiter creates a
 new "level."
fields.name: DELIMITER
fields.comment:
Character used to create a "hierarchy" for a property name; the delimiter creates a
 new "level."

fields.javadoc: Category name for the Browser options that affect the display.
fields.name: CATEGORY_BROWSER_DISPLAY
fields.comment: Category name for the Browser options that affect the display.

fields.javadoc: Category name for the Browser Navigation Marker options.
fields.name: CATEGORY_BROWSER_NAVIGATION_MARKERS
fields.comment: Category name for the Browser Navigation Marker options.

fields.javadoc: Option for the base font.
fields.name: OPTION_BASE_FONT
fields.comment: Option for the base font.

fields.javadoc: Category name for the "Select by Flow" options.
fields.name: CATEGORY_FLOW_OPTIONS
fields.comment: Category name for the "Select by Flow" options.

fields.javadoc: Option for the following computed calls when selecting by flow.
fields.name: OPTION_FOLLOW_COMPUTED_CALL
fields.comment: Option for the following computed calls when selecting by flow.

fields.javadoc: Option for the following conditional calls when selecting by flow.
fields.name: OPTION_FOLLOW_CONDITIONAL_CALL
fields.comment: Option for the following conditional calls when selecting by flow.

fields.javadoc: Option for the following unconditional calls when selecting by flow.
fields.name: OPTION_FOLLOW_UNCONDITIONAL_CALL
fields.comment: Option for the following unconditional calls when selecting by flow.

fields.javadoc: Option for the following computed jumps when selecting by flow.
fields.name: OPTION_FOLLOW_COMPUTED_JUMP
fields.comment: Option for the following computed jumps when selecting by flow.

fields.javadoc: Option for the following conditional jumps when selecting by flow.
fields.name: OPTION_FOLLOW_CONDITIONAL_JUMP
fields.comment: Option for the following conditional jumps when selecting by flow.

fields.javadoc: Option for the following unconditional jumps when selecting by flow.
fields.name: OPTION_FOLLOW_UNCONDITIONAL_JUMP
fields.comment: Option for the following unconditional jumps when selecting by flow.

fields.javadoc: Option for the following pointers when selecting by flow.
fields.name: OPTION_FOLLOW_POINTERS
fields.comment: Option for the following pointers when selecting by flow.

fields.javadoc:
Option for the max number of hits found in a search; the search
 stops when it reaches this limit.
fields.name: OPTION_SEARCH_LIMIT
fields.comment:
Option for the max number of hits found in a search; the search
 stops when it reaches this limit.

fields.javadoc: Category name for the "Auto Analysis" options.
fields.name: CATEGORY_AUTO_ANALYSIS
fields.comment: Category name for the "Auto Analysis" options.

fields.javadoc: Options name for Browser fields
fields.name: CATEGORY_BROWSER_FIELDS
fields.comment: Options name for Browser fields

fields.name: MNEMONIC_GROUP_TITLE
fields.comment: Options title for Mnemonic group.

fields.javadoc: Options title for Operand group.
fields.name: OPERAND_GROUP_TITLE
fields.comment: Options title for Operand group.

fields.javadoc: Option name for whether to show the block name in the operand.
fields.name: OPTION_SHOW_BLOCK_NAME
fields.comment: Option name for whether to show the block name in the operand.

fields.javadoc: Category name for Browser Popup options
fields.name: CATEGORY_BROWSER_POPUPS
fields.comment: Category name for Browser Popup options

fields.name: CATEGORY_DECOMPILER_POPUPS

fields.name: OPTION_NUMERIC_FORMATTING

fields.javadoc: Option name for the max number of go to entries to be remembered.
